nodes.text: Kick of the Bantha was the name of a melee combat fighting move. Ziton Moj was a Falleen member of the Black Sun criminal organization who knew the move and attempted to use it against the bounty hunter Asajj Ventress when he fought her in the Black Sun fortress on the planet Mustafar. Ventress was able to deflect the move with ease and defeat Moj.
Kick of the Bantha first appeared in the novel Dark Disciple, which was written by Christie Golden and published in 2015.
